title: Can my personal statement be creative? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why not? depending only on you, of course, but everything is possible. Universities are tired of a boring personal statement. So more creative you will be - higher chances for successful applying you will have. I want to propose for you to visit specialized websites, such as this this one. You will find there some tips and samples that can help you to write unique and interesting personal statement.
